ygData.subject: Re: Petition questions (Was: On the topic of...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They changed it so you have a base 5% chance to miss a note/fizzle a spell even with the simplest songs/spells. ... High blues will resist a lot more than
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, Bard wrote:
>
> Also, you mihgt ask why missed notes occur so often with even the lowest lvl
> songs. I'm 26th, play Hymn and Selo's on a nearly constant basis, and STILL
> miss notes quite often. If you play a song that much, you should not even
> miss notes in your sleep.

They changed it so you have a base 5% chance to miss a
note/fizzle a spell even with the simplest songs/spells.

> Also, is it just bards, or do blue con's resist
> the hell out of the caster's spells too? (Got 5, that's right "FIVE"
> resisits on DDD in a row from the hermit in SK the other night :o/ )

High blues will resist a lot more than low blues.
Unfortunately, you inexplicably lose the ability to /con the
difference between high and low blue mobs when you reach level
25.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
